1edad7a1-73c8-48a2-b450-eb0f5737147b.name: output file
1edad7a1-73c8-48a2-b450-eb0f5737147b.description: Receives the path of the output file

f4c1e05b-833c-47bb-83ea-678e686c29b0.type:
{
  optional "deviceId": number,
  optional "skip non speech chunks": boolean,
  optional "max length": number,
  optional "non speech timeout": number,
  optional "sample rate": number
}
f4c1e05b-833c-47bb-83ea-678e686c29b0.name: parameters
f4c1e05b-833c-47bb-83ea-678e686c29b0.description:
Optional parameters to be set as **static values**:
 * "deviceId": the id of the device to use for reording (defaults to the system default, for list of devices see audio/Speech recorder/Audio input device lister)
 * "skip non speech chunks": whether to use automatic speech recognition to exclude from the recording periods where no speech was detected (defaults to false)
 * "max length": maximal length of the recording in milliseconds, after that time recording will be stopped, (defaults to 0 meaning no timeout)
 * "non speech timeout": length of the period in milliseconds after that recording will be stopped (defaults to 3000)
 * "sample rate": sample rate to use for the recording (defaults to 16000)

d347b181-4d3f-4f6d-8988-2f0c0286933e.name: recorded
d347b181-4d3f-4f6d-8988-2f0c0286933e.description: Sends out the path of the recorded Wave file.

bf3a02c5-f0c7-499f-bdbc-ec178485a1f2.name: events
bf3a02c5-f0c7-499f-bdbc-ec178485a1f2.description: Sends out events at various stages of the recording with default message and parameters to construct custom message.

58896cf7-70c3-4698-9258-ad3928fa3614.name: error
58896cf7-70c3-4698-9258-ad3928fa3614.description: Sends out any error occured during recording

name: audio/Speech recorder
description: Records speech via microphone (default audio input device) in Wave format.
